english.segment1: Blessed is the man. Who walks in Your favor. Who loves all Your words. And hides them like treasure. In the darkest place. Of his desperate heart, They are a light. A strong, sure light.
english.segment2: Sometimes I call out Your name. But I cannot find You. I look for Your face, But You are not there. By my sorrows, Lord, Lift me to You, Lift me to Your side.
english.segment3: CHORUS. Lord of Eternity, Father of mercy, Look on my fainting soul. Keeper of all the stars, Friend of the poorest heart. Touch me and make me whole.:
english.segment4: If You are my defender, Who is against me?. No one can trouble or harm me. If You are my strength. . All I ask, all I desire. Is to live in Your house all my days.
